topic_name: Why do we forget where we leave our keys but not how to ride a bike?
og_name: Why do we forget where we leave our keys but not how to ride a bike?
og_description: Human memory is an intriguing thing. On the one hand, we forget things all the time. On the other, there are things we never seem to forget. How could this be though? Flavia Schechtman Belham explains.
